verses.verse: וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אֲבִימֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְרֻבַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H3378><s%> of Jerubbaal שְׁכֶ֔מָה <S%H7927><s%> to Shechem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲחֵ֖י <S%H251><s%> brethren אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> unto his mother's וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and communed אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole מִשְׁפַּ֛חַת <S%H4940><s%> with them and with all the family בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> father אִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> of his mother's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> Speak נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> now בְּאָזְנֵ֨י <S%H241><s%> I pray you in the ears כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בַּעֲלֵ֣י <S%H1167><s%> of all the men שְׁכֶם֮ <S%H7927><s%> of Shechem מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Which טּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Whether [is] better לָכֶם֒ הַמְשֹׁ֨ל <S%H4910><s%> reign בָּכֶ֜ם שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> [which are] threescore and ten אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> persons כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> for you either that all the sons יְרֻבַּ֔עַל <S%H3378><s%> of Jerubbaal אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or מְשֹׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> reign בָּכֶ֖ם אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> over you or that one וּזְכַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H2142><s%> over you? remember כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that עַצְמֵכֶ֥ם <S%H6106><s%> also that I [am] your bone וּבְשַׂרְכֶ֖ם <S%H1320><s%> and your flesh אָנִֽי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

וַיְדַבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> spake אֲחֵֽי־ <S%H251><s%> brethren אִמּ֜וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> his behalf בְּאָזְנֵי֙ <S%H241><s%> of him in the ears כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בַּעֲלֵ֣י <S%H1167><s%> of all the men שְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> of Shechem אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיֵּ֤ט <S%H5186><s%> inclined לִבָּם֙ <S%H3820><s%> and their hearts אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> to follow אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Abimelech כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> for they said אָחִ֥ינוּ <S%H251><s%> He [is] our brother הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> They

וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> And they gave לוֹ֙ שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> him threescore and ten כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver מִבֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> out of the house בַּ֣עַל בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1170><s%> of Baalberith וַיִּשְׂכֹּ֨ר <S%H7936><s%> hired בָּהֶ֜ם אֲבִימֶ֗לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> wherewith Abimelech אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H582><s%> persons רֵיקִים֙ <S%H7386><s%> vain וּפֹ֣חֲזִ֔ים <S%H6348><s%> and light וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> him

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> And he went בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> unto his father's עָפְרָ֔תָה <S%H6084><s%> at Ophrah וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֞ג <S%H2026><s%> and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֧יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons יְרֻבַּ֛עַל <S%H3378><s%> of Jerubbaal שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> [being] threescore and ten אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> persons עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> upon one וַיִּוָּתֵ֞ר <S%H3498><s%> was left יוֹתָ֧ם <S%H3147><s%> notwithstanding yet Jotham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son יְרֻבַּ֛עַל <S%H3378><s%> of Jerubbaal הַקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> the youngest כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נֶחְבָּֽא׃ <S%H2244><s%> for he hid ס

וַיֵּאָ֨סְפ֜וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All בַּעֲלֵ֤י <S%H1167><s%> And all the men שְׁכֶם֙ <S%H7927><s%> of Shechem וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the house מִלּ֔וֹא <S%H4407><s%> Millo וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיַּמְלִ֥יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> and made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Abimelech לְמֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> by אֵל֥וֹן <S%H436><s%> by the plain מֻצָּ֖ב <S%H5324><s%> of the pillar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H7927><s%> that [was] in Shechem

וַיַּגִּ֣דוּ <S%H5046><s%> And when they told לְיוֹתָ֗ם <S%H3147><s%> [it] to Jotham וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> and stood בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> in the top הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of mount גְּרִזִ֔ים <S%H1630><s%> Gerizim וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up קוֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וַיִּקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> and cried וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֗ם שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> unto them Hearken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me בַּעֲלֵ֣י <S%H1167><s%> unto me ye men שְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> of Shechem וְיִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> may hearken אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> that God

הָל֤וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> Once הָֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went הָעֵצִ֔ים <S%H6086><s%> The trees לִמְשֹׁ֥חַ <S%H4886><s%> [on a time] to anoint עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> a king וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> over them and they said לַזַּ֖יִת <S%H2132><s%> unto the olive tree [מְלֹוכָה כ] (מָלְכָ֥ה <S%H4427><s%> consult ק) עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ הַזַּ֔יִת <S%H2132><s%> But the olive tree הֶחֳדַ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H2308><s%> unto them Should I leave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּשְׁנִ֔י <S%H1880><s%> my fatness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בִּ֛י יְכַבְּד֥וּ <S%H3513><s%> wherewith by me they honour אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וַאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> and men וְהָ֣לַכְתִּ֔י <S%H1980><s%> and go לָנ֖וּעַ <S%H5128><s%> to be promoted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> carpenter

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said הָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> And the trees לַתְּאֵנָ֑ה <S%H8384><s%> to the fig tree לְכִי־ <S%H1980><s%> come אַ֖תְּ <S%H859><s%> you מָלְכִ֥י <S%H4427><s%> thou [and] reign עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ הַתְּאֵנָ֔ה <S%H8384><s%> But the fig tree הֶחֳדַ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H2308><s%> unto them Should I forsake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָתְקִ֔י <S%H4987><s%> my sweetness וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּנוּבָתִ֖י <S%H8570><s%> fruit הַטּוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> and my good וְהָ֣לַכְתִּ֔י <S%H1980><s%> and go לָנ֖וּעַ <S%H5128><s%> to be promoted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> carpenter

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said הָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> the trees לַגָּ֑פֶן <S%H1612><s%> unto the vine לְכִי־ <S%H1980><s%> come אַ֖תְּ <S%H859><s%> you [מָלֹוכִי כ] (מָלְכִ֥י <S%H4427><s%> consult ק) עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ הַגֶּ֔פֶן <S%H1612><s%> And the vine הֶחֳדַ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H2308><s%> unto them Should I leave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תִּ֣ירוֹשִׁ֔י <S%H8492><s%> my wine הַֽמְשַׂמֵּ֥חַ <S%H8055><s%> which cheereth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וַאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> and men וְהָ֣לַכְתִּ֔י <S%H1980><s%> and go לָנ֖וּעַ <S%H5128><s%> to be promoted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> carpenter

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> all the trees אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָטָ֑ד <S%H329><s%> unto the bramble לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> come אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you מְלָךְ־ <S%H4427><s%> thou [and] reign עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָאָטָד֮ <S%H329><s%> And the bramble אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעֵצִים֒ <S%H6086><s%> unto the trees אִ֡ם <S%H518><s%> If בֶּאֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> If in truth אַתֶּם֩ <S%H859><s%> you מֹשְׁחִ֨ים <S%H4886><s%> ye anoint אֹתִ֤י <S%H853><s%> לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> me king עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> over בֹּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> over you [then] come חֲס֣וּ <S%H2620><s%> [and] put your trust בְצִלִּ֑י <S%H6738><s%> in my shadow וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אַ֕יִן <S%H369><s%> else תֵּ֤צֵא <S%H3318><s%> come out אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> and if not let fire מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣אָטָ֔ד <S%H329><s%> of the bramble וְתֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> and devour אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְזֵ֥י <S%H730><s%> the cedars הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בֶּאֱמֶ֤ת <S%H571><s%> truly וּבְתָמִים֙ <S%H8549><s%> and sincerely עֲשִׂיתֶ֔ם <S%H6213><s%> Now therefore if ye have done וַתַּמְלִ֖יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> in that ye have made Abimelech וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if טוֹבָ֤ה <S%H2895><s%> be better עֲשִׂיתֶם֙ <S%H6213><s%> and if ye have dealt עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <S%H3378><s%> with Jerubbaal וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and his house וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if כִּגְמ֥וּל <S%H1576><s%> unto him according to the deserving יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands עֲשִׂ֥יתֶם <S%H6213><s%> and have done לֽוֹ׃

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נִלְחַ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> fought אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> (For my father עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and וַיַּשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <S%H7993><s%> for you and adventured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> his life מִנֶּ֔גֶד <S%H5048><s%> far וַיַּצֵּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> and delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> you out of the hand מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> you קַמְתֶּ֨ם <S%H6965><s%> And ye are risen up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> against my father's הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day וַתַּהַרְג֧וּ <S%H2026><s%> and have slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> threescore and ten אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> persons עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> upon one וַתַּמְלִ֜יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִימֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> and have made Abimelech בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲמָתוֹ֙ <S%H519><s%> of his maidservant עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בַּעֲלֵ֣י <S%H1167><s%> over the men שְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> of Shechem כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because אֲחִיכֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> is your relative הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he
